org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.transport.file

Class FastSFTPSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.core.config.AbstractConfigurationElement
      • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.transport.base.AbstractTransportSender
        • org.adroitlogic.ultraesb.transport.file.FastSFTPSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationElement, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanNameAware

    public class FastSFTPSender
extends AbstractTransportSender

    A Performance enhanced SFTP sender - which keeps authenticated connections open for fast uploads

    • ultra.file.name - the name of the file to write the message as
    • ultra.file.timestamp_format - an optional timestamp format to attach to the filename written e.g. "yyyy_MM_dd_'T'HH_mm_ss.SSSSZ"
